name: Immersion in Paradox
description:
Setting

Our novel tells about a 19-year-old guy, who is the third-year student of the biochemistry faculty at the university. He is the same as other students of his age. The same problems with apartments, family. He is not much smart or strong, he's a "B" student and one the one hand, got used to this life. But some incredible events happen to him. Something unexplained is going to his body and only a bunch of people can help him deal with it.

Visual novel sufficiently describes the daily routine of our student at first. After that, what happened to him, things are moving incredibly fast. One day, he suddenly feels sick for no reason and he begins to see strange things, get to places, which are not supposed to exist. Later Constantine finds out, that he has a gift and because of it somebody starts hunting him. Together with his friends he tries to find a way out of this situation.

Will he deal with it? It's up to you!

Features:

- Dozens of hours of gameplay. More than 80 000 words in script file.

- Excellent music and atmosphere. We tried to make a great soundtrack and atmosphere, that may impress you!

- Choices. Great variety of choices and storylines. 6 different endings and the same number of romantic storylines!

- Ren'py. The game was developed with the Ren'py engine with light interface, what will allow us quickly and qualitatively finish our visual novel.

*Immersion in paradox is currently in development.
